mapper.insert: INSERT INTO refund (refund_id, order_id, refund_sn, order_sn, doctor_id, hospital_id, user_id, user_phone, add_time, order_amout, order_refund, refund_paymentname, refund_paymentcode, refund_message, user_message, refund_type, refund_state, user_confirm) VALUES (#{id}, #{orderId}, #{refundSN}, #{orderSN}, #{doctorId}, #{hospitalId}, #{userId}, #{userPhone}, #{addTime}, #{orderAmout}, #{orderRefund}, #{refundPaymentname}, #{refundPaymentcode}, #{refundMessage}, #{userMessage}, #{refundType}, #{refundState}, #{userConfirm});
